entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the fjord early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
